fields_of_interest: Trade, Consumers, Customs, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Transport, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives:
As a member of EGARA Association (European Group of Automotive Recyckling Associations) we support all initiatives proposed by EGARA. 
Moreover, we want to take part in public consultation which are now in progress regarding Batteries Directive 2006/66/EC. In the future, we want to be an active member of discussion on ELV Directive (Directive 2000/53/EC) - as an association of auto recycler's in Poland.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations

goals__remit: FORS Association main goals are to organize a national and world-wide cooperation between car dismantlers, as well as car producers and insurance agencies. We focus on cooperation with government to improve Polish law. We also act against grey economy.
